contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of December, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is REVERSED. See Commonwealth v. Polo, 563 Pa. 218, 759 A.2d 372, 2000 Pa. LEXIS 2415 (2000).
Justice SAYLOR has filed a Dissenting Statement joined by Justice CASTILLE.
